items.name: 6 Pack / Saturated In Citra
items.desc:
Saturated In Citra 8% is a single hop DIPA!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service once you have received an email stating that your order is completed! In light of the new lockdown measures we are expecting delivery couriers to be extremely busy, especially in the lead up to Christmas. As a result it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your consideration of this when ordering. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Show Nuff
items.desc:
Show Nuff 6.2% IPA is a new IPA with a sticky mix of rye and light caramel malt. On the dry hop there is Citra for lychee, Idaho 7 for pineapple and Equanot for squishy fruit flavours!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service once you have received an email stating that your order is completed! In light of the new lockdown measures we are expecting delivery couriers to be extremely busy, especially in the lead up to Christmas. As a result it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your consideration of this when ordering. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Something Good 7
items.desc:
Something Good is a rotating IPA series at 6.2% where we explore new ingredients, techniques and processes with the hope of hitting on something good…enjoy!
For our 7th iteration, we explore a new cellaring process in the aim to reduce some of our conditioning time. Wheat and a touch of biscuit malt make up the malt bill, while copious amounts of Citra backed up by Simcoe creates an avalanche of beautiful hoppiness. Enjoy!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service from when you receive an email that we have finished processing your order! Couriers are still experiencing unprecedented demand and it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your patience. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Something Good Three
items.desc:
Something Good is a rotating IPA series at 6.2% where we explore new ingredients, techniques and processes with the hope of hitting on something good…enjoy!
For this iteration we have used 100% CRYO hops and a new dry hopping technique!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.

items.name: 6 Pack / Tappy Pils
items.desc:
Tappy Pils is 4.4 %, our Pilsner. A crisp, hoppy lager with bready malt character and a long bitter finish. We utilise fresh Saphir and Hersbrucker hops for snappy noble German hop character, and honour time, tradition and patience to create a beautiful, clean Pils. Enjoy!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service once you have received an email stating that your order is completed! In light of the new lockdown measures we are expecting delivery couriers to be extremely busy, especially in the lead up to Christmas. As a result it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your consideration of this when ordering. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Write That Down
items.desc:
Write That Down 6.5% IPA is a new soft juicy IPA with spelt in the grist and Centennial, Galaxy, Mosaic and Riwaka on the dry hop.
This beer is Vegan friendly!
